JungleDelightPayoutsAndRulesShared.Rule1_15_Payout1_1: Wild symbol substitutes for all symbols except Scatter symbol and Mystery Box symbol.
JungleDelightPayoutsAndRulesShared.Rule1_16_Payout1_2: Wild symbol appears on reels 2, 3 and 4 only.
JungleDelightPayoutsAndRulesShared.Rule2_1_Payout2_1: Mystery Box Feature can be triggered randomly on any main game spin.
JungleDelightPayoutsAndRulesShared.Rule2_2_Payout2_2: During Mystery Box Feature, 5 to 10 Mystery Box symbols will appear anywhere on the reels.
JungleDelightPayoutsAndRulesShared.Rule2_3_Payout2_3: All Mystery Box symbol will reveal a randomly selected symbol (excluding Scatter symbol and Wild symbol) and wins are then paid.
JungleDelightPayoutsAndRulesShared.Rule3_1_Payout3_1: 3, 4 or 5 Scatter symbols appearing anywhere will trigger the Free Spins Feature with 8, 10 or 15 free spins respectively.
JungleDelightPayoutsAndRulesShared.Rule3_2_Payout3_2: At the start of Free Spins Feature, a sticky symbol will appear in the middle of the 3rd reel and will remain in that position for the whole free spin session.
JungleDelightPayoutsAndRulesShared.Rule3_3_Payout3_3: At every free spin, all of the sticky symbol(s) will reveal a randomly selected symbol (excluding Scatter symbol and Wild symbol).
JungleDelightPayoutsAndRulesShared.Rule3_4_Payout3_4: When all of the reels stop spinning, any symbol on the reels that matches with the sticky symbol will be transformed into a sticky symbol for the rest of the remaining free spins.
JungleDelightPayoutsAndRulesShared.Rule3_5_Payout3_5: There can be at most 15 sticky symbols on the reels during the Free Spins Feature.
JungleDelightPayoutsAndRulesShared.Rule3_6_Payout3_6: Scatter symbol does not appear during Free Spins Feature.

JungleDelightRules.Rule1_1: Jungle Delight is a 5-reel, 3-row video slot featuring Mystery Box symbols and free spins with sticky symbols.

Rule1_2.value: The game is played with 20 bet lines (fixed), bet level of %{minBetMtp} to %{maxBetMtp} and bet size of %{minChip} to %{maxChip}.
Rule1_2.comment: %{minBetMtp}, %{maxBetMtp}, %{minChip}, %{maxChip} will be minimum bet level, maximum max level, minimum bet size and maximum bet size in numeric form.
Rule1_2.example: The game is played with 30 bet lines (fixed), Bet Level of 1 to 10 and Bet Size of 0.01 to 10.

JungleDelightRules.Rule1_17: Free Spins Feature is played at the same bet size and bet level as the spin that triggered the Free Spins Feature.
